host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les équipements Polycom RPRM via SNMP}
{EN: Template to check Polycom RPRM devices using SNMP protocol}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Polycom RPRM using SNMP protocol
host_templates.name: HW-Device-Polycom-Rprm-SNMP

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin-Pack to monitor Polycom RPRM devices using the SNMP protocol.**

Available host template and related services:

|HW-Device-Polycom-Rprm-SNMP-Custom|
|---|
|Cluster-status|
|License|
|Provisioning|
|SiteLinks|
|Sites|
|Updates|

**Plugin-Pack pour superviser les équipements Polycom RPRM en SNMP.**

Modèle d\'Hôte disponible et Services associés

|HW-Device-Polycom-Rprm-SNMP-Custom|
|---|
|Cluster-status|
|License|
|Provisioning|
|SiteLinks|
|Sites|
|Updates|

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.04.2 or later
* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Polycom RPRM SNMP
